[[File:Flag_parrying.gif|thumb]]
__TOC__
==Description==
Parrying is used to completely block melee blows or archery shots from opponents. In usual practice you must equip a Shield in order to parry - Which type doesn't make a difference. If you fail to parry, a shield still offers Armor Rating. Parrying can only be used when holding a shield which results in the restriction of one handed weapons.

==Recommended Leveling==
:0-50: Buy from NPC
:50-100: Get attacked by monsters or players while wearing a shield.
